chara.textHome: I had the worst luck with finding@good editors back in the day...
That's why I wished "to find an editor who@recognized my abilities and valued my work"@rather than for talent...
I wanted a foot in the door.
I knew in my heart that my stories@would touch everyone who read them.
Though mysteries themselves, a genre@that rejects its own premise called@"anti-mystery" also exists.
From a certain point of view,@authors could also be called inventors.
Power is building, I can feel it...
Now, I'll be able to obliterate@more enemies than ever before!
Yes, my mind is clear!
Great ideas are just on the horizon!
Some people get hung up on@where to begin when writing a novel.@
However, it's what you want@to write that's important.
Ideas are there, floating in space.
Though you can only see them@by straining your eyes.
Once you find one, either write it down@ or burn it into your memory so you can@bring it out when the time is right.
What next? What should befall them?
Oh, there you are.
Me? I'm in the middle of writing.
But I think I'm stuck for now...
Good morning...
Even in my dream last night, I was writing.
I can't remember exactly @what I wrote, though.
It seemed like it was going really well too!
I'm having trouble writing...
Plus my stomach is telling me@it's time for a break.
How about having some lunch?
An amazing idea just came to me!@I have to write it down right away!
I'll try to wrap this up by dinner!
Hmm...
Oh, feel free to go to bed if you're tired.
I'm going to stay up a bit@longer and keep writing.
I can't sleep well unless I finish...
I'm out of ideas...
You know what, let's go shopping!
You can buy whatever you want.
Just make sure you're ready to@go in ten minutes!
The path that I walk, that is my life story.
That's why, as a writer,@I have to continue to write.
All right, let's keep moving forward!
So you want to fight me?
Alright then, don't hold back. @After all, I'm going to find all your @weaknesses and use them to my advantage!
I think Kazumi looks good in cute,@bright-colored clothes.
She's so innocent...
Am I the only one who thinks that?
I always try to buy the cheapest@ingredients possible.
Got it?@Our lives are a constant race against money.
Don't even think about calling me cheap!
It feels like anyone in Asunaro City@could potentially become a Witch...
The circumstances there are much@different than in Kamihama City.
Witches follow a specific set of rules when@attacking people,
so one useful tactic is to try to work@through those rules backwards to@predict who they'll target next.
I write everything on my computer.
I don't think I would've become@a writer without my computer.
Oh, this fountain pen?
I just have it because it looks cool.
When I get writer's block, I like to cook.
I'll cook things like wieners,@noodle salad, and cake.
I know it sounds strange, but trust me.
Whether I'm cooking or shopping,@the goal is stress relief.
I can't think clearly if I'm feeling all anxious.
This might sound obvious, but when you@make something yourself, you treasure@it that much more.
I really can't forgive people who don't treat@stuff like that with care.
Huh? Kazumi's hair?
Yeah, Kaoru and I cut it for her.
It was actually my first time cutting hair...
That's why it looks a little crazy…
Now, for the first line...
This wasn't such a bad outcome.
I'll put my pen down for a moment.
That ended just as I planned.
A natural conclusion.
Hang on...like this...or not...
Oh, I'm sorry.@I thought I had a good idea for a new novel.
My name is Umika Misaki.@A pleasure to meet you.
This feels...yes...as if@I have turned a new page.
I've reached the pinnacle...
The period at the end of a sentence@if you will.
What awaits us farther down this path?
Well, let's go find out.
There are so many novel genres.
In mysteries, for instance, you must have an@incident with a twist the reader won't expect,
as well as provide a logically sound@backstory. Those are imperative.
Even mystery novels have their own@classification with many types branching@out. "Orthodox" is at the root of the tree.
This is where things get complicated.
